comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.org Although it does have a similar look to some casinos we've seen before. It looks very legit. It only needs a bit of promotion in the forum which I guess you have plans also like campaigns. Was wondering if you have plans to have internal exchange. Depositing stablecoin and perhaps I wanna play safe using Doge?

comments.author: Jackbit.com
comments.body: Hello, bittraffic!Thanks!The casino is very user-friendly and trusted. Internal exchange is indeed planned and we support stable coins as well. You are also welcome to use Dogecoin, many users are very frequently using Dogecoin without any issue.

comments.body: Thank you all for the warm welcome!Yes indeed we have bonuses and daily giveaways for our constant playersFYI, we don't put wagering on our players to make their experience better

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Quote from: Jackbit.com on January 13, 2023, 11:44:18 AMThank you all for the warm welcome!Yes indeed we have bonuses and daily giveaways for our constant playersFYI, we don't put wagering on our players to make their experience betterThat's great to hear! It's always a plus when a casino offers bonuses and daily giveaways for their players, as it can make the experience more exciting and increase the chances of winning. Good luck to your casino!
